lines.text:
[Last lines]
What's the use of trying?
Buck up - never say die. We'll get along.

its factors of control insure against spots on the shirt front. These are but a few of the delightful features of the Billows Feeding Machine. Let us demonstrate with one of your workers, for actions speak louder than words. Remember, if you wish to keep ahead of your competitor, you cannot afford to ignore the importance of the Billows Feeding Machine.

[from the Telescreen in the restroom to the factory worker]
Hey you! Get back to work!
lines.character: President of the Electro Steel Corp.
